segments.text: I see the water cascading over the sink edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a steady stream hitting the floor hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom-type figure is drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Totally unaware of the flood building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it already—slippery disaster incoming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's climbing that unstable stool for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in the jar, the other with a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, hand out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's adorable how they're sharing the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I'm angry she isn't watching them closer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view through the window is peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This indoor chaos feels so out of place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed— he could fall any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's streaking down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't look away from the potential accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
